items.sentence: If you're tired of arguing with strangers on the Internet, try talking with one of them in real life.
The doctors thought he was dead, but today he is still alive and healthy, and has a job and a family.
Farming looks mighty easy when your plow is a pencil and you're a thousand miles from the corn field.
My neighbors never complain about how loud my parties are because I always invite them to my parties.
Memories came flooding back when Tom found some photos from his childhood in an old box in the attic.
Recently Tom and I seem to just keep missing each other. I never seem to be able to meet up with him.
Tom is always sleeping in class. It almost seems like he goes to school just to catch up on his sleep.
Tom rolled out of bed at 6:30, shuffled into the kitchen and put two slices of bread into the toaster.
Tom was determined not to make the same mistakes with his children that his parents had made with him.
My father, grandfather, great-grandfather and great-great-grandfather all had the same name as I have.
